13112.content:
In a large barren plain, seemingly in the middle of nowhere, a lone figure could be seen walking along. Amongst the multitude of broken rocks, dead trees and dusty paths, it was the only sign of movement for miles. The darkened sky and grey surroundings made a large contrast to the colourful attire that the figure wore. What such a person would be doing in such a place was not clear, only beknowst to the person herself and her closest sibling.

"My feet are swollen.....we haven't seen anything for miles!" The person groaned. This blue skinned beauty was Hsien Ko, a young girl with plenty of magic and ability at her disposal. Despite her initial form as a Jiang Shi, she was actually a Darkhunter, a role which specialised in taking out Darkstalkers.

"Your feet can swell? I didn't know that still happened when you're dead!" Another voice chirped up, which came from the girl's sister Meiling. Taking her role as the ofuda on Hsien Ko's head, she provided a great deal of help with controlling the powers she held.

"Oooh...not again Sis!" Hsien Ko hung her head back in annoyance, then swung it back around with a pop from her neck. "You know I don't like you talking about my....condition. Just call me a Jiang Shi at least!"

Meiling merely wafted in front of her sister's face. "Why get so hot and bothered about it? Even If I called you different it wouldn't change the fact that you're dead. Besides, it's easier to say that anyway."

Hsien Ko moaned a little more, pulling her arm out from one of her massive sleeves, snaking past her ofuda sister and rubbing her face. "Don't wind me up Mei.....I'm really tired and I just want to find some answers as much as you do!" She took a look behind her, back at the vast road of emptiness. "We've been travelling for hours and we've gotten no answers on how to get us back home. The only lead we have is the Darkstalkers, supposedly some of them know about things like this...."

"Yeah, you're right Sis. All we can do is keep on going and just hope something will come across us soon...."

However, the hope wasn't needed as the two sisters suddenly came across.....
13112.title: Outside force or power

131122.content:
Right in the middle of their path, a figure swooped down at a lightning past speed and landed hard onto the floor. Dust flew all across the path, causing Hsien Ko to shield her eyes.

"Woah! What in blazes was that?" Meiling exclaimed, trying to see past all the dust so she could find out what lay before them. Being an ofuda paper, she had no need to protect herself from the dust.

Eventually, everything settled and a tall figure stood before the two sisters. This person was a male figure who wore a long purplish coat and wore a helmet or sorts similar to a samurai's one. This person featured a pair of massive sharp wings situated at the back and in a very morbid twist, seemed to occasionally leak blood from various areas. They stood and merely stared at Hsien Ko.

While she was a bit intimidated by the person's appearance, she knew it was never good to show weakness. She cleared her throat and shouted defiantly "Hey! Who're you? Are you a Darkstalker?"

The figure nodded. "I suppose it would be polite to introduce myself. I am Jedah Dohma, S-class Darkstalker. I assume you'd want to meet someone like me, being a Darkhunter yourself, no?"

"Huh? How did you know that?" Hsien Ko didn't allow her voice to falter or break, though she was close to doing it.

Jedah simply smiled. "Ah, I know a lot about you young girl. I know of the powers that dwell deep within you, they are quite remarkable, I do say so!"

Suddenly, Meiling burst into the conversation, her paper form fluttering around as if stuck in an updraft. "Cut the filler and get to the point! Why do you know so much about her?"

"As you wish....It was vital information that I needed to decide whether you were fit for the task at hand."

Both sisters grew angry. "Wait a second.....you're the one responsible for bringing us here!?"

"Initially I thought it was a good choice to bring both of you here....but now a problem has arisen. Only one of you has a physical body, even with both of your souls I need physical bodies too if I wish to have the best results...."

"What's that supposed to mean?" Hsien Ko began showing her agitation here.

"I think you may need some resizing if you are to truly be worthy enough for my plan..." Jedah chuckled a little.

Meiling exploded at this point. "We've heard enough of your garbage! Go on Sis, let's cut him to ribbons!"

As Hsien Ko brandished her claws ready for attack, it was only mere moments before Jedah made his first attack on her. With lightning fast speed, he shot his arm outwards towards Hsien Ko, ramming his lengthy arm right into her mouth.

Her neck was sent flying back as Jedah's arm entered her mouth with considerable force. A flow of liquid began to pour from his arm down Hsien Ko's throat, which could be identified as blood. The thick fluid tasted sickening and almost set off her gag reflexes. However, it wasn't long before Hsien Ko kicked back into gear and swiped at the arm. With one swing, her metallic claws tore Jedah's arm off. She spat out the severed arm from her mouth bent over to send a fountain of blood expelling from her body. Despite this, she had already forcibly swallowed a fair amount of the disgusting stuff.

"That should be just about enough...." Jedah mused to himself as he tended to his stump. "I just wish she hadn't tore my good arm off, it'll take a while to form back..."

Hsien Ko soon flowed up her assault, sending a plethora of sharp metal projectiles at Jedah as he flew off into the distance. Only a few scraped him, with most of them missing completely.

"I shall see you in the future young girl, I will be awaiting the results!" He jeered as he flew off out of view.

Hsien Ko held her tongue out of her mouth, which had been stained red from the blood. "What is his problem....even for a Darkstalker he's a real freak!"

"What the hell did he do that for anyway?" Meiling asked, still fuming. "Is he just trying to creep you out or something, cause if he was it worked on me!"

"I don't know Mei, but now we know who actually brought us here,which is great." Hsien Ko began to walk down the path again. stepping past the pool of blood Jedah left in his wake. "Let's keep heading onwards to find some more places or people. If we mention that guy maybe some people will know where he lives."

"Or we'll just find ourselves some more trouble. Either way it's all we can do right now, so let's keep going Sis!" Meiling cheered her sister on as they made their way down the path once more, though the reason behind Jedah's bizzare attack remained unknown...

1311222.content:
Though they had walked for some time now, the two sisters had finally came across a form of civilization, being in the form of a lone village. It was a bit of a weird sight, having an entire community set out in the middle of nowhere, but it was at least somewhere to explore and get some answers. Heading down the slope carefully to avoid losing her footing, Hsien Ko followed the pathway to the village gates.

Much to her and Meiling's dismay, the village was completely abandoned. The setting in front of the entrance showed broken carriages and dead bodies all over. The air was thick with the stench of rotting flesh. Houses were broken into, large patches of scorched earth were fires once raged and the distinct sound of pure silence due to no life remaining whatsoever.

Hsien Ko stepped over the rubble of a destroyed shack, inspecting the entire village. "Damn....we finally find somewhere to search and it's completely wrecked. I'm starting to think we'll never find a way back home now..."

"Hey, chin up sis!" Meiling perked up. "Just because there's no one here doesn't mean we won't be able to find something useful! Maybe there's some kind of main building or a village hall we can find. They usually have some super valuable stuff that we might be able to use!"

"Well, if you say so. If this village got attacked, I'd guess that all the valuable stuff got stolen by now. It's still worth a shot I guess." With a clear idea on what to look for, the blue skinned girl searched around the village for any sign of a hall. Traversing the ruined buildings proved to be difficult, as her long sleeves continuously became caught on the rubble that occupied the floor.

Thankfully, luck shined on the two sisters. Before them was a very large, grand building with very little damage to it. A few windows were smashed, but aside from that it was mostly intact. The front double doors were still standing, showing some wear which would suggest the village attackers did try to break in. This was even more evident with the broken battering ram near the doors.

"Looks like you were right Mei, there actually is a village hall here! The doors aren't broken into at all, so there's gotta be something inside!"

The ofuda charm fluttered around happily. "Right on Sis! Use one of your bombs to bust the door open and we'll take a look inside!"

Listening to her sister's instruction, Hsien Ko flicked an oversized sleeve up into the air, throwing out a rounded object which fit the description of a bomb. It was cartoony in it's style, being black and fully rounded. It had a comical fuse on top which strangely wasn't lit, but the ticking the bomb made along with the visual number timer on the front still showed it's imminent detonation. The jiang shi threw the bomb towards the double doors, landing it right on the front porch.

As the timer of the bomb counted down, a face appeared on the bomb. Looking sleepy at first, it took a single look at the countdown timer and it's eyes widened. It's pupils darted around scared along with it's mouth frozen in a "O" position. As the timer reached one, the bomb shut it's eyes and mouth bracing for impact. With a not so earth shattering kaboom, the bomb was no more, having taken the door with it.

"I do feel sorry for those bombs sometimes." Hsien Ko added. "You think they can feel pain?"

"Meh, how should I know?" Meiling replied. "Let's check out this hall already!" Having not gotten her answer, Hsien Ko just shrugged and approached the now clear entrance to the village hall. When there, she saw that the main hallway did indeed have something inside.
1311222.title: Wait, they've found something?

choices: Let's go to the Human World!
13112222.content:
Inside of the deserted hall, one thing stood out beyond all else. While the aged wood bore nothing of interest, most likely taken by the previous owners due to the lack of break ins, a sole glimmering metallic object shone before Hsien Ko's eyes. embedded into the wall and kept in good condition, was a large safe. A traditional twisting knob for opening the safe was present on the front, but she doubted she would be able to open it through normal means.

"Jackpot!" Meiling exclaimed. "I knew we'd find something neat in here! Come on Sis, let's crack this safe!"

"Do we need to specifically crack the safe?" Hsien Ko asked, walking towards the wall. "I'm sure if we look around the place we'll find the code for the safe."

"Nah, it'd take too long if it was around here anyway. Just fish out some spiked balls in your sleeves and bust the safe open!"

"Well, if you insist..." Obeying her Sister, the Jiang Shi faced the safe and put her hands into her sleeves. Getting her aim correct, she fished out the aforementioned spiked balls and with surprising strength, threw them out of the sleeves, off the claws and right into the safe. One by one, they slammed into the protective casing, creating huge dents due to the weight and force of the balls. When the final ball struck the safe, the door was unable to take anymore punishment, snapping it's hinges right off and sending the door crashing to the wooden floor, revealing the contents inside.

Their efforts to break into the village hall and bust open the safe were certainly worth it, as inside the armoured vault was the glittering sheen of gold. Meiling's ofuda form danced all around Hsien Ko's face as she laid eyes on the gleaming coins and shimmering jewellery inside. It stacked up on top of each other and filled up the entire safe, with the sheen from rubies and emeralds shining out from their nests inside the piles of gold. Even just a fraction of the valuables would be enough to give someone an experience in the lap of luxury.

"AH HA!" Meiling yelled, hurting her sister's ears. "I told you we'd find something good here! Grab it all, stuff it into those sleeves!"

Listening to her and taking the many piles into her sleeves, Hsien Ko questioned. "While money is nice to have, why do we need it right now? We're supposed to look for answers and information."

"One word sis; Bribery. With this much loot, we can easily pay people to tell us what we wanna know without roughing them up like we usually do. I know you don't like fighting too much, so this should make things much easier!"

"Hmmm...that is a good reason." Hsien Ko thought. "Well, I've got everything out of the safe." She jingled her sleeves to show this. "Where should we look next for some information? I don't think we'll find much more in these wastelands."

Meiling thought carefully about this.
13112222.title: A large reinforced vault!

131122221.content:
Donning a long brown robe, complete with hood to cover her head, Hsien Ko and Meiling traversed the lands to make their way to Abaraya, a place they'd been before after having a run in with a certain bloodthirsty Samurai. It had taken a long while, but the two sisters had finally reached their destination, a very dilapidated area made up of a fully functioning shanty town community.

"Are you sure we'll find someone that'll help us get some info?" Hsien Ko asked her sister as she looked about at the numerous different houses. "This place doesn't look like the place you'd find some insider sources..."

"Oh, you're just scared we'll run into that Samurai again! I know he gave you a pretty tough fight last time we saw him!" Meiling assured with a positive voice. "Trust me, we'll find someone here. They probably won't look the type, but once we've showed him some of the gold we've plundered they'll spill all their secrets."

However, as the duo continued their search through the near endless amount of run down houses and shops, their search was beginning to seem fruitless. The majority of people around them were mere hobos and drunkards, all of them either too sick or too drunk to talk coherently.

"Still think we'll find someone here sis?" Hsien Ko sat down on a rotted wooden bench and hunched over, jingling her claws under the robes.

"Hey...don't be unoptimistic!" Meiling replied, her voice faltering. "Tell you what, I'll go find someone in these houses myself, and you just sit back in an alleyway or somewhere! Come on, we'll find you a place to hang out!"

Sighing deeply, Hsien Ko obeyed her sister and got up from the bench, finding a narrow passage between two sizeable houses. Hiding out in the darkened area, she waited as her Ofuda began to glow, before bursting in a small flash. Now before her stood the true form of Meiling, decked out in her normal yellow and orange clothing along with her short brown hair.

"Alright sis, just keep yourself under control like we practice and as soon as I find someone, I'll get back to ofuda form, okay?" Giving two thumbs up, Meiling walked out from the passage and walked over to the nearest shop she could find, disappearing inside.

Hsien Ko now waited, leaning against the wall as she did. She was slightly concerned about herself now she had no ofuda, but she was confident she'd be able to control herself. However, her time in hiding did not last long.

info.brief_description: An interactive story where various stars of the Darkstalkers series are yours to expand!
info.description:
First off, here's what the stories will focus on:

* Weight Gain
* Inflation
* Breast Expansion
* Butt Expansion
* Giantess
* Fruitification {Blueberry-style Inflation}
* Muscle Growth
* Hourglass {Breast+Butt Expansion}

Here are some rules for this story.

1. Feel free to mix expansion types within one storyline, but please try to keep the focus on the type that was originally chosen.

2. Sexual content is fine, but like everything else, don't half-ass it.

3. No insanely fast massive expansion or growth.

4. USE PROPER SPELLING AND GRAMMAR SKILLS. I cannot stress this rule enough!

5. Like it or not, the majority of the male characters must be Midnight Blissed if you want to expand them.
